${ModID}:Ignition.NAME: Ignition
${ModID}:Ignition.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Channel a ${ModID}:Blaze.

${ModID}:DualBlade.NAME: Dual Blade
${ModID}:DualBlade.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Evoke your next Orb twice.

${ModID}:Sphere.NAME: Sphere
${ModID}:Sphere.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Channel a ${ModID}:randomized Orb.

${ModID}:Winterwisp.NAME: Winterwisp
${ModID}:Winterwisp.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you have any empty Orb Slots, channel a ${ModID}:Scourge and trigger its passive ability.

${ModID}:FrozenMagma.NAME: Frozen Magma
${ModID}:FrozenMagma.DESCRIPTION: Channel 1 ${ModID}:Scourge. NL Channel 1 Frost. NL Channel 1 ${ModID}:Blaze. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:FrozenMagma.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Channel 1 ${ModID}:Scourge. NL Channel 1 Frost. NL Channel 1 ${ModID}:Blaze.

${ModID}:Consolidate.NAME: Consolidate
${ModID}:Consolidate.DESCRIPTION: Remove your first 2 Orbs. NL Gain 1 Focus. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:Consolidate.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Remove your first 2 Orbs. NL Gain 1 Focus.

${ModID}:VoidEngine.NAME: Void Engine
${ModID}:VoidEngine.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Focus. NL Gain 1 Orb Slot. NL Shuffle a Void into your draw pile.
${ModID}:VoidEngine.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Focus. NL Gain 1 Orb Slot. NL Add a Void to your discard pile.

${ModID}:Hope.NAME: Hope
${ModID}:Hope.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you Evoke an Orb, gain !M! stslib:Temporary_HP. NL Channel 1 ${ModID}:Hope.
${ModID}:Hope.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you Evoke an Orb, gain !M! stslib:Temporary_HP. NL Channel 1 ${ModID}:Hope.

${ModID}:ChaosGenerator.NAME: Chaos Generator
${ModID}:ChaosGenerator.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, Channel !M! random Orb.
${ModID}:ChaosGenerator.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, Channel !M! random Orbs.
